caption.p: Climate, priors and estimated index P for Recife and São Paulo. (a, c) Local humidity (magenta) and temperature (turquoise) time series per day. (b, d) Examples of MVSE informed priors: mosquito life span (blue) and incubation period (yellow); human incubation (purple) and infectious (green) periods. (e, f) Estimated index P per day with mean (red) and 95% confidence interval (grey). Priors were assumed to be the same for Recife and São Paulo. See Supplementary Information S2 Text for prior distributions
